settings.description: BASIC SET Off Delay. The time after which the device will send a BASIC SET (0) to the device in group 2 (1-65535 seconds)
settings.label: Seconds

settings.description: Value sent with BASIC SET to group 2 after off delay (0=0ff, 1-99=level, 255=ON)
settings.label: Level

settings.description: Time sensor will beep and light LED when water is detected (1-255 minutes)
settings.label: Minutes

settings.description: Time sensor remains quiet between each reminder alarm (1-255 minutes)
settings.label: Minutes

settings.description: Time sensor beeps before it is muted (10-255 seconds)
settings.label: Seconds

settings.description: Length of each beep after initial alarm (5-255 seconds)
settings.label: Seconds
